channel.title: Fun on rohilaHarsh
channel.description: Recent content in Fun on rohilaHarsh

item.title: Prince of Persia Warrior Within
item.description: About This is a PC game released in 2004. I used to play this game in school days and had lots of fun. This is the 2nd part of the Prince of Persia Trilogy . All 3 games in the trilogy are good, but this 2nd part was the best of them. What I loved At that time I didn’t understood the game story, I just used to love the parkour type of moves which we can do in this game and finding the way through this adventure game.

item.title: Attack on Titan
item.description: Attack on Titan is a show whose story is one of the best I ever came across. Some series are worth your time. These are the type which demonstrates how creative humans can be. The writer of this show - Hajime Isayama - is a genius. About this show Attack on Titan is an anime , which started in 2013. Its having 4 seasons. As of writing this post, its IMDb rating is 9.
